```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(moderndive)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
library(openintro)
library(broom) 
library(tidyverse)
library(alr4)
library(ggridges)
library(fivethirtyeight)
```


```{r}
san_andreas %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = worry_bigone, fill = region))
```

```{r}
san_andreas %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_jitter(aes(x = age, y = experience, color = prepared))
```

```{r}
san_andreas %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = fam_san_andreas, fill = worry_bigone))
```
